entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow and ice pellets changing to freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
